ComicInfo.Title: A Dream of Milk and Honey; The Summoning; The Awakening of Tamaki; Cosmix
ComicInfo.Summary:
The companion book to Star*Reach continues with a story from the legendary Steve Ditko.
Editorial: Friedrich (1 page text article)
A Dream of Milk and Honey: Gilbert (16 pages)
The Summoning: Levitz, Ditko (8 pages)
The Awakening of Tamaki: Marrs, Mukaide (12 pages)
Cosmix: Sim (4 pages)
